member.name: T:susp_ext.SpringCalc
member.summary: Provides spring calculation functions for helical compression springs. Includes calculations for spring rate, stress, buckling, and dimensional parameters.
member.remarks: Calculations based on ISO 11891:2012 - Hot formed helical compression springs — Technical specifications.

member.name: F:susp_ext.SpringCalc.gValue
member.summary: Standard gravity acceleration value in m/s²

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.NumberOfActiveCoil(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the number of active coils from spring properties.

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.WireDiameter(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the required wire diameter from spring properties.

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.SpringRate3(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the spring rate using Young's Modulus.

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.SpringRate(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the spring rate using Modulus of Rigidity (Shear Modulus).

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.SpringIndex(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the spring index (ratio of mean coil diameter to wire diameter). Typical values range from 4 to 12.

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.WahlFactor(System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the Wahl stress correction factor for curvature and direct shear effects.

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.FreeHeight(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the free height of the spring (unloaded length).

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.TorsionalStressCorrected(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the corrected torsional stress using the Wahl factor.

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.TorsionalStress(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the uncorrected torsional stress in the spring wire.

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.Zvalue(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the Z-value (stress per unit load).

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.RootN(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the nth root of a number.
member.param: The number to find the root of
The root power (e.g., 2 for square root, 3 for cube root)
member.returns: The nth root of the number

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.OptimumWireDiameter(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the optimum wire diameter for a given load and stress.

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.NoOfEndCoil(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the number of end coils based on spring end condition.
member.param: Spring end condition type (e.g., "CLOSED GROUND", "OPEN NON GROUND")

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.MinLength(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the minimum length of the spring assembly.
member.param: Sum of minimum gaps in mm

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.SolidLength(System.Double,System.Double,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Calculates the solid length (fully compressed length) based on end condition and manufacturing method.
member.param: Spring end condition (e.g., "CLOSED GROUND", "OPEN NON GROUND")

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.MaxSpringLoad(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the maximum spring load at solid length.

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.RideFrequency(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the ride frequency (natural frequency) of the suspension system.

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.WireLength(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the total length of wire required for the spring.

member.name: M:susp_ext.SpringCalc.checkBuckling(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Checks if the spring will buckle under the maximum deflection.
member.param: Seating coefficient (typically 0.5 for fixed ends, 1.0 for one end free)
member.returns: True if spring will not buckle, False if buckling will occur

member.name: T:susp_ext.TyreCalc
member.summary: Provides tyre and rim calculation functions for automotive applications. All calculations follow standard tyre sizing conventions and ETRTO standards.

member.name: M:susp_ext.TyreCalc.NominalDesignDiameter(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Calculates the nominal design diameter of a tyre including rim width correction.

member.name: M:susp_ext.TyreCalc.RollingCircumference(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Calculates the rolling circumference of a tyre.

member.name: M:susp_ext.TyreCalc.StaticLoadedRadius(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Calculates the static loaded radius of a tyre (78% of unloaded radius).

member.name: M:susp_ext.TyreCalc.MaxDiameterInService(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Calculates the maximum diameter in service (104% of nominal diameter).
member.returns: Maximum diameter in service in mm

member.name: M:susp_ext.TyreCalc.RimWidthCorrection(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Calculates the rim width correction factor for diameter adjustments. Applies 5mm correction per 0.5 inch deviation from standard rim width.

member.name: M:susp_ext.TyreCalc.MeasuringRimWidth(System.String)
member.summary: Converts rim width from inches to millimeters.

member.name: M:susp_ext.TyreCalc.SpecifiedRimDiameter(System.String)
member.summary: Converts rim diameter from rim size code to millimeters.

member.name: M:susp_ext.TyreCalc.MaxWidthInService(System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the maximum width in service (104% of design section width).
member.returns: Maximum width in service in mm

member.name: M:susp_ext.TyreCalc.DesignSectionWidth(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Calculates the design section width based on tyre specifications and rim width. Accounts for rim width variance from theoretical width.

member.name: M:susp_ext.TyreCalc.PublishValue(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates a DataTable containing all calculated tyre parameters.
member.param: If True, uses max in-service values; otherwise uses design values
member.returns: DataTable with Parameter, Value, and Unit columns

member.name: M:susp_ext.TyreCalc.PublishRimValue(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a DataTable containing all calculated rim/wheel parameters.
member.returns: DataTable with Parameter, Value, and Unit columns

member.name: M:susp_ext.TyreCalc.CalcRimWidth(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the standard measuring rim width for a given tyre specification. Based on ETRTO standards for aspect ratio to rim width ratios.
